name: Nico-Quick-Start
title: Nico's Quick Start
author: OmgItsNico
description:
Start out with a few resources and simple machines so you can skip the mind-numbing first ~30 minutes of running around like chicken, picking up stuff here and feeding coal into other stuff over there.

You only start out with stuff you would be able to get by hand. The difference is, now you don't have to!

Based on "Skip first hour" by Aidan647
